issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: ResourceManager throws MetricsException on start up saying QueueMetrics MBean already exists

comments.body: This is specific to the FifoScheduler, as the error doesn't occur when configured to use the CapacityScheduler.

@Jason, You are right, It happens only for  the fifo scheduler . In the FifoScheduler.setConf() method it was registering default QueueMetrics. This setConf method is getting called twice(as part of scheduler instance creation and reinitialize()) and causing the exception logging.

I have moved the default QueueMetrics registration to reinitialize()  to call only once..

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12518610/MAPREDUCE-4008.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 eclipse:eclipse.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    -1 core tests.  The patch failed these unit tests:
                  org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestWritableJobConf

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/2064//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/2064//console

This message is automatically generated.
The TestWritableJobConf failure is a known issue, see MAPREDUCE-4010.
+1 thanks Devaraj! I committed this to trunk and branch-2
